properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 15 at 8:34PM PST until February 17 at 3:00AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the first Small Craft Advisory, seas 8 to 11 feet
at 13 seconds. For the second Small Craft Advisory, northwest
winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas 10 to 12
feet at 10 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 3 AM PST Sunday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, from 9 PM Sunday to 3 AM PST
Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST SUNDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM SUNDAY TO 3 AM PST MONDAY
